song_lyrics: Bāl pankhī bāl pankhī bāl pankhī re,
Ham BAPS ke bāl pankhī re,
Ham BAPS ke bāl pankhī re, pankhī re,
Ham dūt shānti ke nyāre nyāre,
Ham Pramukh Swāmī ke pyāre pyāre,
Pyāre pyāre pyāre pyāre,
Ham BAPS ke bāl pankhī re... 1
Sanyam niyam ke pankh hamāre hai,
Ūnche ūḍāḍ liye dil hamāre hai,
Ham yātri bhūmī dariyā ke,
Ham yātri pūrī duniyā ke,
Ham BAPS ke bāl pankhī re... 2
Ham vāris hai ṛuṣhi munio ke,
Ham sapūt sanskṛuti viro ke,
Swāminārāyaṇ ham gāte jāye,
Ānand kī dhūn machāte jāye,
Ham BAPS ke bāl pankhī re... 3
Sarararar sunati kalīyā, sarararar sunati kalīyā,
Rang berangī pankh prasāre, sarararar sarararar sun,
Sarararar sunati kalīyā, sarararar sunati kalīyā,
Falak zapakate ūḍāḍ le, sarararar sunati kalīyā,
Bagīyan me ghar āngaṇ me,
Paudhe paudhe van van me,
Sad‌guṇo ke fulo se raspān kare,
Sarararar sunati kalīyā, sarararar sunati kalīyā... 4
Ham chanchal man har ang dhare,
Ham bhātī bhātī ke rang bhare,
Vivek vidyā vinay shīltā,
Shraddhā aur musakān bhare,
Sab ke pyāre hṛuday dulāre,
Rang berang pankh prasārī, sarararar sunati kalīyā,
Sarararar sunati kalīyā, sarararar sunati kalīyā... 5
Mahek rahe ham sundar sundar fūl,
Mahek rahe ham komal komal fūl,
Pramukh Swāmī ke bāg me khīle hai,
Mahek rahe ham, mahek rahe ham,
Mahek rahe ham, mahek rahe ham,
Sundar fūl, sundar fūl,
Bhīnna bhātī ke rang sugandh se,
Bhare bhare ham bhare bhare ham,
Sundar fūl, sundar fūl...
Mahek rahe ham, sundar sundar fūl,
Mahek rahe ham komal komal fūl... 6
Ang bhare re bhīnna bhīnna rang,
Chhalak rahe hai ur ur umang,
Ham surabhīt rahe, sab ko surabhīt kare,
Ham pulakīt rahe, sab ko pulakīt kare... 7
Ham dusaro ke līye jīye, ham dusaro kī sevā kare,
Prabhu kī kare ham prārthanā, sab kī ho shubh bhāvanā,
Ham dusaro ke līye jīye, ham dusaro kī sevā kare,
Dusaro kī bhalāī me, bhalā hamārā hai,
Dusaro ke ānand me, ānand hamārā hai,
Pramukh Swāmījīne dīyā sandeshā ye pyārā,
Duniyā kā jīvo ke ye sukh dene vālā,
Ham dusaro ke līye jīye, ham dusaro kī sevā kare,
Ham prem-bandhutā sab sen kare, ham vishva-shānti kī jyot jale,
Ham dusaro ke līye jīye, ham dusaro kī sevā kare... 8
title: Bāl pankhī bāl pankhī ham BAPS ke bāl pankhī re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1051: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Nrutya Gito
